venue.name: AT&T Center
venue.address: 1 AT&T Center Parkway, San Antonio, TX 78219

Courtside.Description: Experience the game up-close with direct access to the court, offering unmatched views and the chance for interactions.
Courtside.View_Quality: Immediate access to the action on the court, providing an unparalleled viewing experience.
Courtside.Unique_Features: Opportunities for close-up player interactions and visibility on TV broadcasts.
Courtside.Accessibility: Premier accessibility features for all guests, including those with disabilities, with premium entry points.
Courtside.Special_Perks: Access to exclusive clubs and lounges, complimentary gourmet dining options, and personalized VIP services.

Lower_Bowl.Description: Engaging sightlines near the action, perfect for fans wanting both view and proximity.
Lower_Bowl.View_Quality: Excellent views with minimal obstructions, ideal for an immersive game experience.
Lower_Bowl.Unique_Features: Comfortable seating with additional amenities and options for premium experiences.
Lower_Bowl.Accessibility: Convenient access for all, with nearby entrances and facilities.
Lower_Bowl.Special_Perks: Enjoy in-seat service and access to exclusive areas designed for an enhanced game-day experience.

Upper_Bowl.Description: Cost-effective options with expansive views, great for fans looking to enjoy the game's atmosphere.
Upper_Bowl.View_Quality: Wide-angle views of the arena, capturing the essence of the game and the crowd's energy.
Upper_Bowl.Unique_Features: An affordable way to be part of the Spurs' live action.
Upper_Bowl.Accessibility: Easily accessible with a range of amenities close by for convenience.
Upper_Bowl.Special_Perks: An ideal choice for those seeking a budget-friendly way to experience the thrill of a Spurs game.

Suites_and_Club_Seats.Description: Exclusive and intimate viewing experiences with premium amenities for an exceptional game day.
Suites_and_Club_Seats.View_Quality: Elevated views in a more private setting, with luxury seating and exceptional sightlines.
Suites_and_Club_Seats.Unique_Features: Dedicated service and access, with upscale dining and entertainment options.
Suites_and_Club_Seats.Accessibility: VIP treatment with direct suite and club level access, ensuring a seamless experience.
Suites_and_Club_Seats.Special_Perks: Perfect for hosting guests or enjoying the game in luxury, with customized catering and exclusive access.

restaurants_bars.name: Bill Miller Bar-B-Q
restaurants_bars.address: 3200 S Flores St, San Antonio, TX 78204
restaurants_bars.description: A local chain known for its brisket, fried chicken, and sweet tea, offering a taste of Texas barbecue.

restaurants_bars.name: The Big Bib BBQ
restaurants_bars.description: Award-winning barbecue spot famous for its tender meats and homemade sides, a favorite among locals.

restaurants_bars.name: Smoke Shack
restaurants_bars.description: Known for its smoked meats and casual outdoor seating, it's a great spot for a pre-game meal.

restaurants_bars.name: La Gloria
restaurants_bars.address: 100 E Grayson St, San Antonio, TX 78215
restaurants_bars.description: Innovative Mexican street food in a vibrant atmosphere, perfect for dining out before Spurs games.

restaurants_bars.name: Pearl Brewery
restaurants_bars.description: A culinary and cultural destination featuring top-notch restaurants, bars, and shops in a historic brewery setting.

restaurants_bars.name: The Esquire Tavern
restaurants_bars.address: 155 E Commerce St, San Antonio, TX 78205
restaurants_bars.description: The oldest bar on the San Antonio Riverwalk, offering a wide selection of drinks and upscale pub fare.

restaurants_bars.name: Alamo Beer Company
restaurants_bars.description: Local brewery with a great selection of craft beers, live music, and outdoor seating.

accommodations.name: Hotel Emma
accommodations.address: 136 E Grayson St, San Antonio, TX 78215
accommodations.description: A luxurious hotel offering unique rooms and top-notch amenities, located within the historic Pearl Brewery complex.

accommodations.name: The St. Anthony, a Luxury Collection Hotel, San Antonio
accommodations.address: 300 E Travis St, San Antonio, TX 78205
accommodations.description: This historic hotel combines modern luxury with timeless elegance, located in downtown San Antonio.

accommodations.name: Hotel Valencia Riverwalk
accommodations.address: 150 E Houston St, San Antonio, TX 78205
accommodations.description: Stylish accommodations with a Spanish Colonial and Modern Mediterranean flair, right on the San Antonio Riverwalk.

accommodations.name: Mokara Hotel & Spa
accommodations.address: 212 W Crockett St, San Antonio, TX 78205
accommodations.description: An oasis of calm in the heart of San Antonio offering luxurious rooms, a full-service spa, and fine dining options.

accommodations.name: The Westin Riverwalk, San Antonio
accommodations.address: 420 W Market St, San Antonio, TX 78205
accommodations.description: Enjoy upscale accommodations with a serene Riverwalk location, offering spacious rooms and signature Westin amenities.

accommodations.name: JW Marriott San Antonio Hill Country Resort & Spa
accommodations.description: A luxurious resort offering a retreat from the city with a golf course, water park, and spa located in the beautiful Texas Hill Country.

tourist_attractions.name: The Alamo
tourist_attractions.description: A historic Spanish mission and fortress compound, famous as the site of the Battle of the Alamo in 1836.

tourist_attractions.name: San Antonio River Walk
tourist_attractions.description: A city park and network of walkways along the banks of the San Antonio River, lined by bars, shops, restaurants, nature, and public art.

tourist_attractions.name: San Antonio Missions National Historical Park
tourist_attractions.address: 6701 San Jose Dr, San Antonio, TX 78214
tourist_attractions.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site that preserves four of the five Spanish frontier missions in San Antonio.

tourist_attractions.name: Tower of the Americas
tourist_attractions.address: 739 E Cesar E. Chavez Blvd, San Antonio, TX 78205
tourist_attractions.description: A 750-foot observation tower/restaurant in Hemisfair Park, offering panoramic views of the city.

tourist_attractions.name: San Antonio Museum of Art
tourist_attractions.address: 200 W Jones Ave, San Antonio, TX 78215
tourist_attractions.description: Home to a vast collection that spans 5,000 years of global culture.

tourist_attractions.name: Pearl District
tourist_attractions.description: A dynamic neighborhood known for its dining, shopping, and entertainment options, set in a historic brewery complex.

team_related_activities.name: Spurs Fan Shop at AT&T Center
team_related_activities.address: 1 AT&T Center Parkway, San Antonio, TX 78219
team_related_activities.description: The official store for San Antonio Spurs merchandise, located within the AT&T Center, offering a wide range of apparel, accessories, and memorabilia.

team_related_activities.name: AT&T Center Tours
team_related_activities.address: 1 AT&T Center Parkway, San Antonio, TX 78219
team_related_activities.description: Explore the home of the San Antonio Spurs with guided tours that include exclusive areas of the arena not typically open to the public.

options.description: VIA Metropolitan Transit offers bus services that stop near the AT&T Center, providing convenient access from various parts of San Antonio.
VIA also provides Park & Ride services to Spurs games, allowing fans to park at designated lots and take the bus directly to the AT&T Center.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The safest source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and direct support from the team.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: An authorized ticketing partner with a wide selection of seating options and official ticket insurance.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: A trusted secondary marketplace for fans to buy and sell Spurs tickets, backed by a FanProtect Guarantee.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Consider attending weekday games or looking for last-minute ticket deals. Joining Spurs fan clubs or email lists can also provide access to exclusive discounts.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always use official and authorized resellers. Verify the security features of the website and look for buyer protection policies to ensure ticket authenticity.
